name: 12 Week Year Notion Template
description: Say goodbye to always being behind and never being able to accomplish everything you set out to do because this year is going to be the year where you transform your life once and for all. The 12 Week Year Notion Template is here to help you supercharge your hyperfocus and achieve everything you want to achieve this year in only 12 weeks.This Notion template is based on the 12 Week Year concept developed by New York Times bestselling author, and productivity expert Brian P. Moran. It encourages
features: A complete system of databases that helps you track your progress; Monthly Reviews that calculate your monthly progress score; A 'Yearly' overview of your consistency in each task; Customizable graphics for Canva; Yearly review
